title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 9.1 - Method of award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 9.1 - Method of award

State Regulations

Regents scholarships, Regents fellowships, Regents physician
loan forgiveness awards, Regents health care professional opportunity
scholarships, Regents professional opportunity scholarships, science and
technology entry program grants and scholar incentive awards shall be awarded
pursuant to the provisions of the Education Law and the regulations which the

Commissioner of Education is hereby authorized and directed to
promulgate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
9.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
